author: gakuzaizen
content: Is it safe to simply assume the max hashrate drop to be ~50% (coordinating >50% hash power makes 51% attack possible) to adjust the final TTD accordingly? Eg. schedule TTD to hit 2 weeks later -> max 4 weeks until merge (2 weeks *2).

author: taka3750
content: It seems no validators have been activated on kiln since 2 month ago.

author: parithosh
content: Query your local node for up to date info, the Kiln beaconchain explorer is having issues processing deposits

author: parithosh
content:
query your node like this:
```
curl -s http://127.0.0.1:5052/eth/v1/beacon/states/head/validators/<public-key-here> | jq
```
